title: The Isomorphism Problem on Classes of Automatic Structures.
abstract: Several new undecidability results on isomorphism problems for automatic structures are shown: (i) The isomorphism problem for automatic equivalence relations is \pi^0_1-complete. (ii) The isomorphism problem for automatic trees of height $n$ ??? 2 is \pi^0_2$n$–3-complete. (iii) The isomorphism problem for automatic linear orders is not arithmetical.
